marklogic.body: The next time I saw George was about 20 years later. About 3 AM his Lincoln was hub deep in a cotton patch between Columbus, MS and Aberdeen, hiway 45 East. George was drunk and sleeping when I saw his car lights in the cotton field. I got on the CB and called for the hiway patrol. I didn't know it was George Jones until I walked down to the car and woke him up. When I told him I'd sent for the police, George flipped, got mad and after a minute or two asked me if I was going to Tupelo, I told him yes and he rode with me to Tupelo, leaving the car with the engine running. On the way to Tupelo George told me he had friends there, to just let him Off at the Truck Stop in Shannon. That was the last time until I attended a couple of his shows years later. He gave me his address and told me to write, he'd send me his records as he recorded them. I lost track of him after he quit drinking and drugs.. Oh, at that time George had pork-chop side Burns.
